        'Public Function readFile(ByVal FileName As String) As String
        ' Dim fso As FileSystemObject
        ' Dim aFile As TextStream
        ' Set fso = New FileSystemObject
        ' If fso.FileExists(FileName) = True Then
        ' Set aFile = fso.OpenTextFile(FileName, ForReading, False, False)
        ' Else
        ' readFile = ""
        ' Exit Function
        ' End If
        ' Dim buf As String: buf = ""
        ' Do While Not aFile.AtEndOfStream
        ' buf = buf & aFile.Read(1000000)
        ' Loop
        ' aFile.Close
        '
        ' readFile = buf
        ' Exit Function
        'fileError:
        ' MsgBox "Error reading file " & FileName, vbCritical
        'End Function

        'Public Function readFileUTF8(ByVal FileName As String) As String
        ' Dim fso As FileSystemObject
        ' Dim aFile As TextStream
        ' Set fso = New FileSystemObject
        ' If fso.FileExists(FileName) = True Then
        ' Set aFile = fso.OpenTextFile(FileName, ForReading, False, False)
        ' Else
        ' readFileUTF8 = ""
        ' Exit Function
        ' End If
        ' Dim buf As String: buf = ""
        ' Do While Not aFile.AtEndOfStream
        ' buf = buf & aFile.Read(1000000)
        ' Loop
        ' aFile.Close
        '
        ' readFileUTF8 = buf
        ' Exit Function
        'fileError:
        ' MsgBox "Error reading file " & FileName, vbCritical
        'End Function
        '
